(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Pulau) (NNP Ubin))

    (. .)))

  (S
    (NP (PRP It))

          (SBAR (IN if)
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (VBP are)
                (NP (NNP Singaporean)))))
          (CC but)
          (SBAR (IN if)
            (S
              (NP (PRP you))
              (VP (VBP live)
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (NNP Malaysia)))))))))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP it))
      (ADVP (RB probably))
      (VP (VBZ looks)
        (PP (IN like)
          (NP
            (NP (RB just) (DT another) (NN one))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (PRP$ their) (JJ small) (JJ little) (NN kampung) (NNS towns)))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (MD would) (RB n't)
        (ADVP (RB even))
        (VP (VB give)
          (NP (DT a) (NN hoot))
          (PP (IN about)
            (PP (IN on)
              (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ social) (NNS media) (NN app)))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP We))
    (VP
      (ADVP (RB just))
      (VBD happened)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB bump)
            (PP (IN into)
              (NP
                (NP (DT an) (JJ old) (NN man))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WP who))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBD had)
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT a) (NN basketful))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP
                            (NP (NNS durians))
                            (PP (IN on)
                              (NP (PRP$ his) (NN bicycle)))))))))))
            (SBAR (IN as)
              (S
                (NP (PRP we))
                (VP
                  (VP (VBD got)
                    (PRT (RP off))
                    (NP (DT the) (NN jetty)))
                  (CC and)
                  (VP (VBD bought)
                    (NP (DT the) (JJ whole) (NN lot))
                    (PP (IN from)
                      (NP (PRP him)))
                    (PP (IN for)
                      (NP (NNP $)))))))))))))

aux(way-15, to-12)
cop(way-15, remain-13)
det(way-15, the-14)
xcomp(going-11, way-15)
nsubj(is-17, it-16)
rcmod(way-15, is-17)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (ADVP (RB really))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ last) (JJ few) (NNS places)))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB where))
          (S
            (NP (PRP you))
            (VP (MD can)
              (VP (VB be)
                (VP (VBN transported)
                  (PRT (RP back))
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (NN time)))
                  (PP (TO to)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT a) (NN way))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP (NN life)))
                      (SBAR
                        (WHNP (WDT which))
                        (S
                          (NP (PRP we))
                          (VP (MD can) (RB all)
                            (VP (VB feel)
                              (ADJP (JJ nostalgic) (IN about))
                              (SBAR (RB even) (IN if)
                                (S
                                  (NP (PRP you))
                                  (VP (VBD had)
                                    (VP (VBN grown)
                                      (PRT (RP up))
                                      (PP (IN in)
                                        (NP (DT a) (NNP HDB) (NN estate))))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(one-4, It-1)
advmod(one-4, really-2)
cop(one-4, is-3)
root(ROOT-0, one-4)
prep(one-4, of-5)
det(places-9, the-6)
amod(places-9, last-7)
amod(places-9, few-8)
pobj(of-5, places-9)
advmod(transported-14, where-10)
nsubjpass(transported-14, you-11)
aux(transported-14, can-12)
auxpass(transported-14, be-13)
rcmod(one-4, transported-14)
prt(transported-14, back-15)
prep(transported-14, in-16)
pobj(in-16, time-17)
prep(transported-14, to-18)
det(way-20, a-19)
pobj(to-18, way-20)
prep(way-20, of-21)
pobj(of-21, life-22)
dobj(feel-27, which-23)
nsubj(feel-27, we-24)
aux(feel-27, can-25)
advmod(feel-27, all-26)
rcmod(way-20, feel-27)
acomp(feel-27, nostalgic-28)
dep(nostalgic-28, about-29)
advmod(grown-34, even-30)
mark(grown-34, if-31)
nsubj(grown-34, you-32)
aux(grown-34, had-33)
advcl(feel-27, grown-34)
prt(grown-34, up-35)
prep(grown-34, in-36)
det(estate-39, a-37)
nn(estate-39, HDB-38)
pobj(in-36, estate-39)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB also))
      (NP
        (NP (CD one))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (JJ last) (JJ few) (NNS places))
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (NNP Singapore))))))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB where))
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (MD can)
            (VP (VB find)
              (NP (NNP uniquely) (NNP Singapore) (NNS durians)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(one-4, It-1)
cop(one-4, is-2)
advmod(one-4, also-3)
root(ROOT-0, one-4)
prep(one-4, of-5)
det(places-9, the-6)
amod(places-9, last-7)
amod(places-9, few-8)
pobj(of-5, places-9)
prep(places-9, in-10)
pobj(in-10, Singapore-11)
advmod(find-15, where-12)
nsubj(find-15, you-13)
aux(find-15, can-14)
advcl(one-4, find-15)
nn(durians-18, uniquely-16)
nn(durians-18, Singapore-17)
dobj(find-15, durians-18)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (JJ other) (NN place))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (NN course) (NNP Pulau) (NNP Tekong))))
    (, ,)))


det(place-3, The-1)
amod(place-3, other-2)
nsubj(is-4, place-3)
root(ROOT-0, is-4)
prep(is-4, of-5)
nn(Tekong-8, course-6)
nn(Tekong-8, Pulau-7)
pobj(of-5, Tekong-8)


(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (NP (DT those) (NNS durians))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (VP (VBN reserved)
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP
            (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ young) (NNP Singpaorean) (NNS males))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP who))
              (S
                (VP (VBP are)
                  (VP (VBG undergoing)
                    (NP
                      (NP (PRP$ their) (NN rite))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP (NN passage))))
                    (PP (IN from)
                      (S
                        (VP (VBG being)
                          (NP
                            (NP (NNP Ah) (NNPS Boys))
                            (PP (TO to)
                              (NP (NN Men)))))))))))))))
    (. !)))


cc(reserved-5, but-1)
det(durians-3, those-2)
nsubjpass(reserved-5, durians-3)
auxpass(reserved-5, are-4)
root(ROOT-0, reserved-5)
prep(reserved-5, for-6)
poss(males-10, our-7)
amod(males-10, young-8)
nn(males-10, Singpaorean-9)
pobj(for-6, males-10)
nsubj(undergoing-13, who-11)
aux(undergoing-13, are-12)
rcmod(males-10, undergoing-13)
poss(rite-15, their-14)
dobj(undergoing-13, rite-15)
prep(rite-15, of-16)
pobj(of-16, passage-17)
prep(undergoing-13, from-18)
cop(Boys-21, being-19)
nn(Boys-21, Ah-20)
pcomp(from-18, Boys-21)
prep(Boys-21, to-22)
pobj(to-22, Men-23)
